text: فَبَدَّلَ ٱلَّذِينَ ظَلَمُواْ مِنۡهُمۡ قَوۡلًا غَيۡرَ ٱلَّذِي قِيلَ لَهُمۡ فَأَرۡسَلۡنَا عَلَيۡهِمۡ رِجۡزٗا مِّنَ ٱلسَّمَآءِ بِمَا كَانُواْ يَظۡلِمُونَ

translation.en: But those who wronged among them changed [the words] to a statement other than that which had been said to them. So We sent upon them a punishment from the sky for the wrong that they were doing
translation.id: Maka orang-orang yang zalim di antara mereka mengganti (perkataan itu) dengan perkataan yang tidak dikatakan kepada mereka,346) maka Kami timpakan kepada mereka azab dari langit disebabkan kezaliman mereka
